articles.name: Sarita Shah
articles.description: Sarita Shah is uneducated and she is from village, Tamakoshi. In the name of her property, she just has her house and some few plot of land where she grows few vegetables and sell them for money.She is 45 years old. Her husband is already dead and her 3 daughters are already married. so she lives alone in the house.

articles.name: Shristi Nepali
articles.description: Shristi Nepali is 10th pass and she is from village, sunkoshi. In the name of her property, she just has her house and some few plot of land where she grows few vegetables ans sell them for money.She is 37 years old. Her husband is physically challenged and her 2 sons are in foreign countries. She liveswith her 1 daughter who is unmarried.

articles.name: Hari krishna Budhathoki
articles.description: Hari Krishna Budhathoki is 8th pass and he is from village, chautaka. In the name of his property, he just has his house and some few plot of his land. He is 30 years old. His wife is dead and he lives with his 2 sons and 1 daughter who are studying in schools

articles.name: Ram Krishna Dhakal
articles.description: Ram Krishna Dhakal is uneducated and he is from village, nepthya. In the name of his property, he just has his house and some few plot of his land. He is 32 years old. His wife is dead and he lives with his 3 childrens who are studying in schools.

articles.name: Kedar Chhetri
articles.description: Kedar Chhetri is 8th pass and he is from village, pandu bazar. He is 25 years old. He is unmarried and lives with his parents who are poor. In the name of their property,they just have their own house and few plot of land. He is still unemployed.

articles.name: Yojana Lamsal
articles.description: Yojana Lamsal is 10th pass and she is from village, lipulek. In the name of her property, she just has her house and some few plot of land where she grows few vegetables ans sell them for money.She is 43 years old. Her husband is physically challenged and her son and daughters are dead.
